climbs.name: Your Own Private Idaho
climbs.fa: FA by Andrew Thaller; 2016.

content.description: Climb a right arcing tan crack featured with small finger pockets.  4 bolts.

climbs.name: Sands of Time
climbs.fa: Bolted by Chris Barnes, Vernon Phinney, & Mike Engle; 2016.

content.description: Start on creamy tan rock, pull through an overlap to a thin seam in a shallow corner.  Climb up to the anchors situated in an alcove above a small roof.  4 bolts.

climbs.name: Sandman
climbs.fa: Bolted by Chris Barnes, Vernon Phinney, & Mike Engle; 2016

content.description: Stem up the gap between the pillar and main wall.  Finish on the Pillar Talk anchors.2 bolts.

climbs.name: Sand Surfer
climbs.fa: Bolted and FA by Andrew Thaller; 2016.

content.description: Climb up to stance below an obvious blunt arête.  Tricky face climbing right then left leads to a stance below deep short corner.  Pull through the corner to a ledge and the anchors.  6 bolts.

climbs.name: Sand in Your Crack
climbs.fa: Bolted by Chris Barnes, Vernon Phinney, & Mike Engle; FA by Terran Engle; 2016.

content.description: Start on stacked blocks to gain a nice hand crack and follow it to the top.  4 bolts.

climbs.name: Sand Blasted
climbs.fa: Bolted by Chris Barnes, Vernon Phinney, & Mike Engle; 2016

content.description: Start in a creamy tan corner low to the ground and pull through a tough overlap on relatively big holds and follow a discontinuous slotted crack to the top on mostly brown rock. Decent hands and poor feet; sustained and pumpy.  4 bolts.

climbs.name: Prophet of Dune
climbs.fa: Bolted by Chris Barnes, Vernon Phinney, & Mike Engle; 2016

content.description:
-

After a brief chossy section, pull onto nicely featured rock and work a seam and hueco’s to a roof with a triangular block at the lip, pull through and face climb to right side of a huge cap stone roof.  6 bolts.

climbs.name: Pillar Talk
climbs.fa: FA by Peter Heekin and Brian Heekin; 2016.

content.description: Climb the east face of the pillar.  3 bolts.

climbs.name: Palm Tree Garage
climbs.fa: FA by Andrew Thaller; 2016.

content.description: This and the previous 3 routes share a shelf about 8 feet off the ground.  From the shelf, move up into the shallow corner and make a hard reach to a decent 3 finger pocket.  Easier climbing leads to the top.  4 bolts.

climbs.name: No More Mr. Nice Guy
climbs.fa: Bolted by Chris Barnes, Vernon Phinney, & Mike Engle;  FA by Nick and Supe Vitali; 2016

content.description: Jam up a steep thin hand crack in a white corner.  Gain a ledge and climb the face just left of a wide crack.  6 bolts.

climbs.name: Nice Guys Finish Last
climbs.fa: Bolted by Chris Barnes, Vernon Phinney, & Mike Engle; 2016

content.description: Follow a crack in a brown corner to a ledge and finish on the last two bolts of No More Mr Nice Guy. 4 bolts.

climbs.name: Needing Whiskey
climbs.fa: Bolted by Chris Barnes, Vernon Phinney, & Mike Engle; 2016

content.description: Follow thin parallel cracks to a right facing corner until you can move left to the anchors of Feeling Frisky.  4 bolts.

climbs.name: Monkey Woman
climbs.fa: Bolted by Chris Barnes, Vernon Phinney, & Mike Engle; 2016

content.description:
Climb a slabby move to a shelf and climb into a tan dihedral.  Follow the dihedral to the top and move left to the anchors on

Your Own Private Idaho

.  4 bolts.

climbs.name: Mirage
climbs.fa: Bolted by Chris Barnes, Vernon Phinney, & Mike Engle; 2016

content.description: Hard opening moves with good feet and bad hands, lead to a shelf.  Finish on easier, pleasant climbing up a white creamy face with pockets.  4 bolts.

climbs.name: Lady Love
climbs.fa: Bolted and FA by Andrew Thaller; 2016.

content.description: Work a corner/arête with the right hand and face climb with the left.  6 bolts.

climbs.name: Interstellar
climbs.fa: Bolted by Chris Barnes, Vernon Phinney, & Mike Engle; 2016

content.description: Climb 10 feet of chossy blocks to gain a tough thin hands crack and crank hard through a small overlap to fully gain the crack, continue to a ledge at 2/3 height and work slightly left up a tough face with a hard move at the anchors.  6 bolts.

climbs.name: Ghost Rider
climbs.fa: Bolted and FA by Andrew Thaller; 2016.

content.description: Hard boulder problem start on excellent rock.  Pull past a flake, slap left and crimp right to a small ledge.  From the ledge follow good holds on brown rock in a shallow corner.

climbs.name: Feeling Frisky
climbs.fa: Bolted by Chris Barnes, Vernon Phinney, & Mike Engle; 2016

content.description: Scramble over blocks down low to a flared hand crack.  Continue up and right to a splitter crack in a brown face.

climbs.name: Enticement (aka Forgot to Remember)
climbs.fa: Bolted by Chris Barnes, Vernon Phinney, & Mike Engle; 2016

content.description: Start on slabby moves on a large detached flake. At the top of the flake, step across to the main wall and follow a featured blunt arête to the top.  4 bolts.

climbs.name: Enter Sandman
climbs.fa: Bolted by Chris Barnes, Vernon Phinney, & Mike Engle; FA by Nick and Supe Vitali; 2016.

content.description: Start on brown rock and face climb into a nice and continuously thin shallow open book.  3 bolts.

climbs.name: Chu WannaGunks (aka CB’s Roof)
climbs.fa: FA by Andrew Thaller; 2016.

content.description: Just right of the pillar, face climb up to large roof just below the anchors.4 bolts.

climbs.name: Cherokee Social
climbs.fa: FA by Brian Heekin and Peter Heekin; 2016.

content.description: Climb the south side of the detached pillar.  2 bolts.

climbs.name: The Bat
climbs.fa: Bolted by Chris Barnes, Vernon Phinney, & Mike Engle; 2016

content.description: Climb another corner system to the right of Monkey Woman.  4 bolts.
